entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sechelt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:45 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sechelt 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 10.3°C
Wind: ESE 37 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except southeast 60 gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this morning. Wind becoming south 50 gusting to 70 early this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this morning. Temperature falling to 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
